title: $1275 -- Florence, Cinque Terre, Milan, Lake Como 10-Nt. Vacations
text:
Home > Vacation Package Deals > $1275 -- Florence, Cinque Terre, Milan, Lake Como 10-Nt. Vacations $1275 -- Florence, Cinque Terre, Milan, Lake Como 10-Nt. Vacations   - October 7, 2015 at 10:21 PM Tweet 
Europe Destinations' "Florence - Cinque Terre - Milan - Lake Como" package allows you to see all four of these amazing Italian destinations. The vacation package starts at $1,247 per person and includes round-trip airfare, a total of 10-nights' accommodations, daily breakfast, and a rail ticket for transportation between the four cities. Also included are airline fuel surcharges and hotel taxes. 
The deal includes: Round-trip airfare from New York City; other departure cities are available at varying rates Three nights' accommodations in Florence Two nights' accommodations in Cinque Terre Two nights' accommodations in Milan Two nights' accommodations in Lake Como All air taxes and fuel surcharges In-country rail travel Hotel taxes Daily breakfast, dependent on preferred hotel 
How to get this deal: Visit European Destinations ' website. These rates from New York City were found for travel during December 4, 2015, though other departure dates and cities are also available. The sale provider hasn't designated a booking deadline. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
